full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/13/2023 Part 2. Sponsor's Promise. For Government 13. I, THE SPONSOR, FOIA (b)(6) Use Only (Print Name) in consideration of the household member's promise to support the following intending immigrant(s) and to be jointly and severally liable for any obligations I incur under the affidavit of support, promise to complete and file an affidavit of support on behalf of the following 1 immigrant(s) (see Step-by-Step instructions). (Indicate Number) named intending Name Date of Birth (mm/dd/yyyy) A-number (if any) U.S. Social Security Number (if any) a. ELUCIE JEROME 6/24/1923 N/A N/A b. c. d. 14 FOIA (b)(6) Part 3. Household Member's Promise. (Date--mm/dd/yyyy) 15. I, THE HOUSEHOLD MEMBER, RIQUETTE LOUIS GARCON in consideration 1 of the sponsor's promise to complete and file an affidavit of support on behalf of the (Print Name) above named intending immigrant(s): (Number from line 13) a. Promise to provide any and all financial support necessary to assist the sponsor in maintaining the of sponsored immigrant(s) at or above the minimum income provided for in section 213A(a)(1)(A) which the affidavit of support is enforceable; the Act (not less than 125 percent of the Federal Poverty Guidelines) during the period in b. Agree to be jointly and severally liable for payment of any and all obligations owed by the sponsor under the affidavit of support to the sponsored immigrant(s), to any agency of the Federal provides means-tested public benefit; Government, to any agency of a State or local government, or to any other private entity that c. form Certify under penalty under the laws of the United States that all the information provided on this is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and that the Federal income tax the Internal Revenue Service. returns submitted in support of the contract are true copies or unaltered tax transcripts filed with d. Consideration where the household member is also the sponsored immigrant: 1 understand that if I am the sponsored immigrant and a member of the sponsor's household that this promise relates only to my promise to be jointly and severally liable for any obligation owed by the sponsor under the affidavit of support to any of my dependents, to any agency of the Federal Government, to any agency of a State or local government, and to provide any and all financial support necessary to assist the sponsor in maintaining any of my dependents at or above the the minimum income provided for in section 213A(s)(1)(A) of the Act (not less than 125 percent of Federal poverty line) during the period which the affidavit of support is enforceable. c. I authorize the Social Security Administration to release information about me in its records to the FOIA (b)(6) igration Services. 16. 5/19/07
